name: Maple's Maid Service
description:
Maple's Maid Service is a laid-back social-simulation game.

Maple is the town's local maid, with her day-to-day life consisting of helping out her fellow residence by doing tasks and chores for them.

Explore a cozy lil town, find tasks to do and head back home to bed whenever you feel like you've done enough.

Click here to play the Web Version and earn achievements!

=CONTROLS=

Movement
[ Arrow Keys | WASD ]

Interact
[ Z | X ]

Broom
[ X | L ]

Pause
[ Q | P ]

Menu Navigation
[ Mouse ]

Fullscreen
[ F4 | Alt + Enter ]

=PATCH NOTES=

v1.0.2 - 26/01/23

  • Slight alterations to fishing to hopefully make it easier
  • Game can now be replayed after reaching the results screen
  • Pause menu will open on the last page you were viewing


v1.0.1 - 25/01/23

  • Pause menu now features a clickable exit button
  • Minor text changes
  • Medal unlock changes to (hopefully) make them more reliable
